results.name: a(n) = floor(tan(n)).
comment: Every integer appears infinitely often. - _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Aug 06 2012
Does not satisfy Benford's law [Whyman et al., 2016]. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 12 2017
